text: [Music]
I'm not an a nerdy guy uh I'm not very

vastly curious person and when the web
first came up spin was only a few years
old and AOL came to us and offered us I
think it was 25 cents an hour if we gave

run a site where people chatted and my
business staff came back said that's
ridiculously low I said take it take it
it's brilliant we'll make a lot of money
and we did that we we were so early that
we were actually one of the people that
got paid to be on the web um and the
reason was IID just seen the way people
wanted to talk about music and the way
communities came together on on chat
rooms that weren't related to us and
they would talk for hours and hundreds
and thousands of people would would get
involved in discussions about the Manu
of Henry rollin's career so I said yeah
great let's be that Community let's
brand ourselves as a place where people

think got 92 on the idea we should sell
we should sell CDs online um we didn't
do it uh it's my great regret and of
course companies like CD Now came out
and were very successful for a while but
um you know I'm not that clever that I
see the future I actually just see the
present pretty well and um I saw that
you know this community Community was
going to adopt the web and they wanted
to chat and you know they couldn't call
up the officers to spin and talk about
music you know that we wouldn't allow
that so they would find each other
online and that exactly what happened
and we actually made as much money
online that first year as we were making
almost as much as we were making on the
magazine so we were very successful of
course eventually a just stopped paying
people and said you know if you want to
be on you got to do a deal with us that
pays us um so you know those first
impressions were the communities gather
out there in The Ether and uh they
congeal together and that never left me
but again I thought in retrospect I can
see that my thinking then was give
people a reason to come and and make it
be why they would go to the web you know
if we had just put up all the old
